dc_title_s: Preliminary geologic map of New York, exhibiting the structure of the state so far as known; Geological Survey of the State of New York; prepared under the direction of James Hall by W.J. McGee.
dc_description_s: Published by authority of the Legislature of the State of New York. Includes legend. Inset: [Long Island]. 1 map on 6 sheets: col.; sheets 82 x 88 cm. or smaller. This map is in the public domain. Please attribute access and use of this digitized map to the Stephen S. Clark Library, University of Michigan Library.
dc_creator_sm: McGee, W J, 1853-1912.,New York State Geological Survey.
